files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Peterson, Holly 

def printBottles(slurmInput):

    for slurmBottles in range(slurmInput,0,-1):
        print("")
        print(slurmBottles,"bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
        print(slurmBottles,"bottles of Slurm..") 
        print("Take one down, pass it around..")
        print(slurmBottles - 1,"bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    
    print("")
    print("No more bottles of Slurm on the wall!")
    
    return

numberOfBottles = int(input("How many starting bottles? "))

while (numberOfBottles <= 1): 
    print("You must enter 1 or more bottles. \n ")
    numberOfBottles = int(input("How many starting bottles? "))

slurmSong = printBottles(numberOfBottles)
